      • optimizeVariables

        public void optimizeVariables(TMLTask task,
                     TMLActivity activity,
                     java.util.ArrayList<TMLError> warnings)
        Search for unused or constant variables. Ununsed variables are removed from the class. Constant variables are also removed from the class, and each time they are used, they are replaced by their respective value.
